entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna's style is recognized by Harry in the kitchen, as evidenced by the bright primary colors and floral patterns used to paint the stove, sink, and cupboards. ("Harry though he recognized Luna’s style: The eﬀect in such an enclosed space, was slightly overwhelming.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is standing in the kitchen and recognizes Luna's style. ("Harry though he recognized Luna’s style: The eﬀect in such an enclosed space, was slightly overwhelming.")

entities.name: kitchen
entities.description: The kitchen is described as being perfectly circular and having a unique design. ("They were standing in the most peculiar kitchen Harry had ever seen.")

relationships.description: Harry recognizes Luna's style in the kitchen. ("Harry though he recognized Luna’s style: The eﬀect in such an enclosed space, was slightly overwhelming.")
